issue_title: [Bug] CLI does not expose Todo.rename() functionality - incomplete API coverage
acceptance_criteria_met: Running 'todo rename 1 New Text' updates existing todo's text
Running 'todo rename 999 text' returns exit code 1 with 'Todo #999 not found' error
Success message sanitizes output like other commands
implementation_summary: Added rename subcommand to CLI that exposes Todo.rename() functionality. Added TodoApp.rename() method, rename subcommand parser, and command handler in run_command().
risks: None - minimal change following existing patterns for done/undone/rm commands.
